bdbc73fa560d.title: Yesterday someone near my SC home was shooting.

paragraphs.text: Yesterday someone near my SC home was shooting. I went out and yelled to them to “Please” observe the 300 yard restriction. They did so, and left. But it occurred to me that from this day, asking someone not to shot in the vicinity of an occupied home may easily (and literally) be seen as “liberal oppression”, and result in “justified” killing by “Bannon’s Army”.
